function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Precarious position of migrant workers","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to contagious diseases due to lack of access to safety nets and reliable information","Mitigation":"Provide access to healthcare, safety nets, and reliable information; address social and economic inequalities","Technologies":"Telemedicine, multilingual information channels, social support platforms","People":"Migrant workers, cities they work in, and homes they return to","Owner":"Government, employers, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Breakdown in social protection due to school closures","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to hunger, malnutrition, and social breakdown","Mitigation":"Implement alternative meal programs, support households, address teenage pregnancy, and protect isolated elderly residents","Technologies":"Online education platforms, community support networks, telehealth services","People":"Children relying on school meals, strained households, isolated elderly residents","Owner":"Government, community organizations, healthcare providers"}]}
